name: L2MExperia
overview:
L2MExperia is a company dedicated for enabling better visibility and better turnover for SMEs. L2MExperia believes in having right decisions at the right time and transforming marketing process by Listening to Market (L2M) and enabling better experience to the clients (Experia).

Vision: Increase the ROI of our clients by enhancing quality of the marketing process through enabling timely marketing process transformation.

Mission: Be one of the best top 10 marketing process consulting companies in the world by 2016

The L2MExperia team is made up of marketing innovators, experienced sales experts, digital marketing visionaries, business entrepreneurs and smart process executives.

Offerings:

  • Sales force Recruitment
  • Out-and-Out Resource services
  • Marketing Process Automation
  • Overall Sales Consulting
